___runOn.description: Gets or sets the runOn which specifies the group name where the job is to be executed.

___parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the job.

___properties.description: Gets or sets the list of job properties.

$eref.description: The properties of the create source control operation.

___branch.description: Gets or sets the repo branch of the source control. Include branch as empty string for VsoTfvc.

___description.description: Gets or sets the user description of the source control.

___publishRunbook.description: Gets or sets the auto publish of the source control. Default is true.

___autoSync.description: Gets or sets auto async of the source control. Default is false.

___repoUrl.description: Gets or sets the repo url of the source control.

___sourceType.description: The source type. Must be one of VsoGit, VsoTfvc, GitHub, case sensitive.

___folderPath.description: Gets or sets the folder path of the source control. Path must be relative.

___securityToken.description: Gets or sets the authorization token for the repo of the source control.

___properties.description: Gets or sets the properties of the source control.
Sets the properties of the source control sync job.

___nonAzureComputerNames.description: List of names of non-azure machines targeted by the software update configuration.

___azureVirtualMachines.description: List of azure resource Ids for azure virtual machines targeted by the software update configuration.
